Referrer Policy is not explicitly defined

Check that sub-resource gets the referrer URL when no explicit Referrer Policy is set.

The referrer URL is stripped-referrer when a document served over http requires an https sub-resource via a-tag using the http-csp delivery method and when the target request is cross-origin.

See specification details for this test.

Scenario outline

Delivery method http-csp
Origin transition cross-origin
Protocol transition from http to https
Subresource type a-tag
Expected result Referrer URL should be stripped-referrer
